message: Take it or leave it, Bob. You'll regret it if you don't.
Meet me halfway, Alice. It's a fair split.
I'm still willing to share, Bob, but I'm not giving away half. This is my final offer.
I'll give you a slight edge, but don't think you're getting away with it that easily!
Bob, we're running out of time. This is my last chance to get a decent share. You'll lose everything if we reach the end.
I'm not going to let you walk away with most of the money, Alice. You're not getting that easy a deal.
Bob, we're both going to lose if we keep this up.  Let's be reasonable. This is my final offer.
I'm not budging, Alice. You're going to have to make a better offer if you want a decent share.
Bob, this is our last chance. If we reach the end, we both get nothing. Take this, or we lose it all.
You're getting desperate, Alice. I'm not afraid to walk away with most of the money.
